message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take $750,000 and you get $250,000. Let's see if we can do better in the next round!
You're starting high, Alice. I'll try to meet you in the middle.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a good deal. I'll take $180,000 and you get $820,000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle now!
You're pushing for a small share, Alice. I'll try to find a balance.
I'm getting desperate, but I need to get something substantial. I'll take $140,000 and you get $860,000. Let's see if you'll accept this time!
You're getting low, Alice. I'll try to meet you at a reasonable price.
I'm getting really desperate, Bob. I'll take $100,000 and you get $900,000. This is my last reasonable offer. Please take it!
You're getting close to nothing, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect it to be a big share.
I'm almost out of options, Bob. I'll take $50,000 and you get $950,000. This is my last stand!
You're really running out of time, Alice. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to be generous.
I'm running out of options, Bob. I'll take $20,000 and you get $980,000. This is my final offer!
You've had your chance, Alice. I'm taking it all. Better luck next time.
